translations: 雇用，聘请；参加，从事；吸引，引起；与……交战，开战；（使）（机器）啮合，接合；<旧>预定（膳食，地方等）；适应，与……有密切关系；允诺，签约保证；（运动员或击剑手）使（兵器）交结在一起；占用

sentences.sentence: Even in prison, he continued to engage in criminal activities.
sentences.translation: 他甚至在监狱里还继续从事犯罪活动。

sentences.sentence: They never learned skills to engage the attention of the others.
sentences.translation: 他们从来没有学过吸引别人注意的技巧。

sentences.sentence: They tried to engage him in conversation.
sentences.translation: 他们试图使他加入谈话。
